2021-08-01.name: Jahy-sama wa Kujikenai!
2021-08-01.desc:
* Based on a comedy slice of life manga by Konbu Wakame.

The Great Jahy, the Dark Realm's second-in-command, cuts a frightening figure, feared and revered by all. But when a run-in with a magical girl results in the destruction of the precious mana crystal, the Dark Realm falls, transporting the newly puny and powerless Jahy to the human world! Unfortunately, plotting the revival of the Dark Realm from a cramped, crumbling one-room apartment is no easy feat when you have rent to pay and a job to keep!

Source: Square Enix

2021-08-01.name: Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica Gaiden 2nd Season - Kakusei Zen`ya
2021-08-01.desc:
* Based on a smartphone role-playing game.

In exchange for the fulfillment of a wish, Magical Girls keep fighting, unbeknownst to the rest of the world. But Tamaki Iroha can't seem to remember her wish.

"When I became a Magical Girl, what did I wish for again?"

There is a gaping hole in her life. Something important has been lost. But she continues to fight every day, without even knowing why... Then, a rumor begins to spread among Magical Girls.

"Magical Girls can be saved if they go to Kamihama."

Kamihama City, the city where Magical Girls and Uwasa are gathering. The story of Tamaki Iroha, in search of her lost wish, begins...

Source: Official website

2021-08-05.name: Tora to Mike Animation
2021-08-05.desc:
* Based on Nekomaki's feline manga.

It follows the comfy daily life of the sisters Tora and Mike, as well as the regular customers at their long-running doteni (boiled beef giblet) shop in Nagoya. The older sister Tora takes care of finances, while Mike handles the cooking and waiting on customers.

Source: ANN

2021-08-06.name: Boku no Hero Academia the Movie: World Heroes` Mission
2021-08-06.desc:
A mysterious organization dedicated to the destruction of people with Quirks has issued a threat and set bombs all over the world. Pro Heroes and those in Hero Internships scramble to find the bombs. Deku, Bakugou, and Endeavor encounter Rodi, a boy living in a mobile home in their designated area of Oseon, and end up working with him.

Source: ANN

2021-08-13.name: Eiga Oshiri Tantei: Sufure-tou no Himitsu
2021-08-13.desc: Note: Shown together with Shinkai no Survival!.

2021-08-13.name: Shinkai no Survival!
2021-08-13.desc: Note: Shown together with Eiga Oshiri Tantei: Sufure-tou no Himitsu.

2021-08-14.name: Hu Yao Xiao Hongniang: Yue Hong 2
Kaizoku Oujo
2021-08-14.desc:
Fena Houtman remembers little about her childhood. Orphaned and raised as a servant in a brothel, her life changes when she escapes to an island of pirates where she discovers the truth behind her family. With Fena being the only one able to unlock her family's secrets, and a formidable crew of female pirates on her tail, she must take her place as captain of her Samurai crew for a high seas adventure!

Source: Crunchyroll

Note: The show received a special premiere on Crunchyroll & Toonami starting from August 14th, ahead of the Japanese broadcast in October.

2021-08-18.name: Tonikaku Kawaii: SNS
2021-08-18.desc:
* Based on a comedy romance shounen manga by Hata Kenjirou.

When Nasa is suddenly called in for some work, Tsukasa spends her first night alone since their marriage began. As the loneliness pulls at her, she takes the smartphone that Nasa got her as a gift in hand and continues to wait. Messaging allows the two of them to stay connected, even while separated.

Source: Crunchyroll

2021-08-19.name: Wo Qi Ku Liao Baiwan Xiulian Zhe

2021-08-20.name: Bang Dream! Film Live 2nd Stage
2021-08-20.desc:
This time, joining "Poppin'Party", "Afterglow", "Pastel✽Palettes", "Roselia", and "Hello, Happy World!" on stage will be 2 new bands! "Morfonica", a symphonic band with a fantastic world view, and "RAISE A SUILEN", a rock band declaring to be the best!

What will the 7 bands aim for on the "2nd Stage"?

Source: BanG Dream! Project

2021-08-21.name: Douluo Dalu: Chongfan Haotian
2021-08-21.desc: The tenth part of Douluo Dalu.

2021-08-27.name: Gekijouban Fate/Kaleid Liner Prisma Illya Licht: Namae no Nai Shoujo
2021-08-27.desc:
The Ainsworth family aims to save the world, but the price is sacrifice of magical girl Miyu — but Miyu's brother, Shirou, won't let them have her without a fight. Now it's up to Illya to step in and find a solution that will save not only Miyu, but the entire world.

Source: Sentai Filmworks

2021-08-27.name: Misaki no Mayoiga
2021-08-27.desc:
The story centers around a traditional Japanese house named "Mayoiga" (named after the Japanese folkloric concept of an abandoned yet well-kept home) from where one can see the sea and feel the touch of warmth and nostalgia. Here, a 17-year-old girl named Yui who is trying to find her place in the world begins a new life with people completely unrelated to her.

Source: ANN
